jj.aboutMeTextShort: Welcome to my travel blog. My name is Janka and my life is constantly pulling me in different directions. I discovered my passion for traveling already in my teenage years. Since then, this passion has been constantly deepening and I am sure that my life is simply connected with getting to know our beautiful planet.
jj.aboutMeTextLong1: Welcome to my travel blog. My name is Janka and my life is constantly pulling me in different directions. I discovered my passion for traveling already in my teenage years. Since then, this passion has been constantly deepening and I am sure that my life is simply connected with getting to know our beautiful planet.
jj.aboutMeTextLong2: I come from the capital of Slovakia, Bratislava. My wandering legs have taken me to many places in Europe, North America, and Asia. I tried life in cold Norway, but also in diverse America. My immediate travel plans are to Southeast Asia and South America for local adventure.
jj.aboutMeTextLong3: Family and friends consider me a reliable travel planner. They know that if I go on a trip with them, they don't need to arrange and solve almost anything and they can simply rely on me. It gives me absolute joy, which can be observed already at the initial initiative of vacationing in the form of bright sparkles in the eyes. That's why I decided to share this passion with you.
